subtasks.name: Regulatory Analysis
subtasks.description: Analyze the RAISE act to determine its implications for AI model usage in pharmaceutical research.
subtasks.notes: Requires collaboration with regulatory counsel.

subtasks.name: Training Development
subtasks.description: Develop training programs for employees on the responsible use of AI models as per the regulation.
subtasks.notes: Training materials should include compliance guidelines.

subtasks.name: Compliance Documentation
subtasks.description: Create and maintain documentation required to demonstrate compliance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Documentation must be thorough to withstand audits.

subtasks.name: Implementation of Transparency Protocols
subtasks.description: Establish protocols for transparency in AI model training and usage as mandated by the act.
subtasks.notes: Technical team must ensure protocols are feasible.

subtasks.name: Monitoring and Reporting
subtasks.description: Set up a system for ongoing monitoring and reporting of AI model usage and compliance.
subtasks.notes: Continuous improvement of the monitoring system is essential.

key_risks: Non-compliance with the RAISE act could lead to legal penalties.
Insufficient training may result in misuse of AI models.

subtasks.name: Regulatory Compliance Assessment
subtasks.description: Evaluate current practices against the requirements of the RAISE Act.
subtasks.notes: Critical to identify gaps in compliance.

subtasks.name: AI Model Review and Documentation
subtasks.description: Document AI models used and ensure they meet transparency requirements.
subtasks.notes: Ensure proper documentation to avoid legal issues.

subtasks.name: Employee Training Program Development
subtasks.description: Create training materials focused on AI safety and compliance.
subtasks.notes: Training must be comprehensive to mitigate risks.

subtasks.name: Implementation of Safety Protocols
subtasks.description: Establish safety and security protocols for AI usage.
subtasks.notes: Ensure protocols are robust to protect sensitive information.

subtasks.name: Ongoing Compliance Monitoring
subtasks.description: Regularly review compliance with the RAISE Act to ensure ongoing adherence.
subtasks.notes: Continuous monitoring is essential to adapt to regulatory changes.

key_risks: Non-compliance could lead to legal penalties and reputational damage.
Inadequate training may result in misuse of AI technologies.
